param.name: address
param.doc: The address to validate for this appliance. An IP address or hostname can be provided.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This API makes it possible to validate if a cluster identifier is appropriate for this node. A cluster identifier is appropriate if it is a statically configured IP address of any type on this appliance. Alternatively, a hostname can be provided. Hostnames are considered valid if they resolve to an IP address that resides on this appliance.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: The cluster identifier is valid for this node.
